TextBlock.Text: BASIL: I set up a little camp here to take my mind off of...
BASIL: I might set some scrolls in particular places? This is more of a personal reminder than anything.
BASIL: ...Like anything isn't at this point.
BASIL: The tallest pillar on Sunset Sister. The south pole of Sunset Sister. In a tree in the Lively Crater on Familiar Refuse.
